page.title: 07STEPHEN'S DAILY ROUTINE
page.content: {I wake up at 7.45 in the morning. Having got washed and dressed,I have my breakfast,usually cereals.At 8.50 I set off for school,waiting in the play ground for the bell to ring at 9.00am. As soon as I go into school,three boys and myself take milk to the classes. After registration we go to assembly.I spend the morning doing number work and writing and at 12 noon I go home for lunch with my younger brother. {At 1.20 pm I bring my brother back to school.In the afternoon we usually do topic work. Before going home at 3.30, we have a story or singing.I play out with my brother until dad comes home about 4.45pm when we have our tea.Then I like to watch television.About 7.45 I have my supper and go to bed at 8.15pm.
